SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
The Account class represents a bank account.
Account.Currency
Enum representing the available currencies for accounts.
AccountNotFoundException
Exception thrown when an account with a specified currency is not found.
AccountRepository
AccountRepository manages the storage and retrieval of account data.
AccountService
AccountService manages operations related to accounts, including depositing funds, creating accounts, and deleting accounts.
Client
The Client class represents a bank client.
ClientRepository
ClientRepository manages the storage and retrieval of client data.
ClientService
ClientService is responsible for managing client-related operations.
CLIService
CLIService provides a command-line interface for interacting with clients and their accounts.
Config
Singleton class responsible for loading and managing application properties.
DatabaseConnector
Singleton class responsible for managing database connections.
DonBankApp
A console application that handles bank transactions.
InsufficientFundsException
Exception thrown when an operation cannot be completed due to insufficient funds in an account.
LoggerConfig
Singleton class responsible for configuring and managing the application's logger.
Transaction
The Transaction class encapsulates all relevant information about a financial transaction.
Transaction.TransactionType
Enum representing the type of transaction.
TransactionRepository
The TransactionRepository class is responsible for managing transactions in the database.
TransactionService
TransactionService manages operations related to transactions, including adding new transactions and retrieving transaction histories.
